def nth_perm(n,d):
    # Calculate the factorial of d-1
    fact = math.factorial(d-1)
    
    # Generate all digits
    digits = [str(i) for i in range(d)]
    
    # Initialize result
    result = ''
    
    # Calculate the nth permutation
    for i in range(d, 0, -1):
        index = (n-1) // fact
        result += digits[index]
        digits.pop(index)
        n %= fact
        if i > 1:
            fact //= i-1
    
    return result
